content: a beginner friendly guide to knitting **hornet** from **hollow knight silksong** this pattern is worked in the flat with decreases/increases only on knit row then seamed together images are also included for steps in construction skill level beginner/intermediate if there s anything i can add to this pattern to make it more beginner friendly please let me know all the stitches this pattern asks for with links to tutorials for anything specified - knit - purl - kfb increase - m1l/krl increase - ssk decrease - k2t decrease - drawstring castoff - slipping stitches onto stitch holder what you need for this project red yarn white yarn black yarn straight knitting needles stitch holder a sewing/darning needle stuffing
